title: The OnePlus 10 doesn’t exist (yet), but the Oppo Reno 8 looks an awfully lot like it
content:
For months we’ve been hearing about the OnePlus 10 Pro, including a complete reintroduction last week when the phone was formally announced for the US and other global markets. But to date, there’s been no sign of a standard OnePlus 10. Now, a leak shows off the Oppo Reno 8 which certainly looks like a OnePlus 10 by another name.

more…

The post The OnePlus 10 doesn’t exist (yet), but the Oppo Reno 8 looks an awfully lot like it appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus 10 only exists in its Pro version, but a fresh leak of the Oppo Reno 8 shows off a device that could easily pass for the OnePlus 10.
